content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5) - currently working
- Boiler (position: -5.0, 2.5) - now fueled with coal and working
- Steam engine (position: 0.5, 6.5) - currently working
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
- Small electric poles for power distribution

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) - now receiving electricity and working
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: 15.5, 72.5) - currently contains 728 iron ore
- Burner inserter to move ore from chest to belt (position: 15.5, 73.5) - waiting for space in destination
- Transport belt system (positions: 15.5, 74.5, 16.5, 73.5, 16.5, 74.5, 17.5, 74.5) connecting to furnace area - currently contains 12 iron ore
- Burner inserter to move iron ore from belt to furnace (position: 17.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Stone furnace (position: 19.0, 73.0) - fueled with coal but has no ingredients to smelt
- Burner inserter for output (position: 20.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Wooden chest for iron plates (position: 21.5, 73.5) - currently empty
- Burner inserter to move iron plates to belt (position: 22.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler

### Copper Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: -46.5, 70.5) - now receiving electricity but waiting for space in destination
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: -46.5, 72.5) - currently full with 800 copper ore
- Burner inserter to move ore from chest to belt (position: -46.5, 73.5) - waiting for space in destination
- Transport belt (positions: -46.5, 74.5, -45.5, 74.5) connecting to furnace - currently contains 7 copper ore
- Stone furnace (position: -43.0, 73.0) - fueled with coal but has no ingredients to smelt
- Burner inserter for input (position: -44.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Burner inserter for output (position: -41.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Wooden chest for copper plates (position: -40.5, 73.5) - currently empty
- Burner inserter to move copper plates to belt (position: -39.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Transport belt connecting to copper cable assembler

### Copper Cable Production at Position(-34.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -34.5, 73.5) with copper cable recipe - now receiving electricity but missing copper plate ingredients
- Burner inserter for input (position: -37.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Burner inserter for output (position: -31.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Wooden chest for copper cables (position: -30.5, 73.5) - currently empty
- Burner inserter to move copper cables to belt (position: -29.5, 73.5) - waiting for source items
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler

### Electronic Circuit Production at Position(-19.5, 60.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -19.5, 60.5) with electronic circuit recipe - now receiving electricity but missing iron plate and copper cable ingredients
- Burner inserter for iron plate input (position: -21.5, 60.5) - waiting for source items
-
